OOC: O.k.

BIC:  Flicker dodges the grenade and transforms to robot mode, 
landing in the middle.  He holds a plasma rifle, not pointed at 
anyone, so it's not threatening, but the barrel is closer to Gatara 
than any other Rouge.  He stares at her with contempt.

Flicker:  We Predicons have a reputation of backstabbing, her sense 
of loyalty is something few of us have.  I intend to show her I have 
learned at least a little loyalty from her.

His voice remains calm, but a tear comes to his eye where it is 
plainly visable.

Flicker:  Now tell me.....what are your terms?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> A grenade rips up the turf at Flicker's feet as the other Rogues 
> arrive.  Gatara reloads her double weapon and holds it pointed at 
the 
> Pred, forgoing the cloak to emphasize her point: "Rogues don't play 
> around, Predacon.  And if you're dealing with us alone, you do it 
on 
> our terms; time is not a factor.  Why would you be so interested in 
> someone who surrendered herself after you nearly died protecting 
> her?  What makes her worth anything to YOU?"
> 
> The other two flank the monstrous bot, as if she needs it to 
heighten 
> her already imposing appearance.
> 
> OOC: Gatara was the only Rogue of these three personally involved 
in 
> that encounter, so she's the only one Flicker will recognize.  
> However, he'll probably realize that Jayde and Riekan are nothing 
to 
> sneeze at either.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Back at the base:
> > 
> > Flicker:  LOOK I DON'T HAVE TIME TO PLAY AROUND!  I'D
> > SAY YOU'D BE ABLE TO REPAIR, OR AT LEAST GET A GOOD
> > START ON REPAIRING YOUR SHIP IF YOU TRADE WITH ME!  IF
> > YOU DON'T YOU KEEP A GIRL WHO WOULD NEVER HELP YOU
> > ANYWAY, JUST ANOTHER ENERGON ABSORBER TO FEED! 
> > GRANTED ON THIS PLANET THAT'S NOT MUCH TROUBLE, BUT
> > SHE'S WORTHLESS TO YOU ANYWAY!
